author: wn.com
title: EU-UNICEF: Safer learning for more than 2 million children caught in Syrian conflict (European Commission ...
text: ( Source : European Commission - Directorate-General for Enlargement ) More than 2 million children whose lives have been torn apart by the conflict in Syria will have better access to education in safe environments through an agreement signed
